name: Final Push Before the Olympex Pass Launch
description:
Q1 is getting closer, and so is the launch of the Olympics Pass NFTs.

These Social Tasks are designed to reward the community that has been supporting Olympex early and helping keep the ecosystem active across our networks.

Once the Olympics Pass NFTs go live, holders will be able to start tracking on-chain and off-chain activity, unlocking eligibility for future rewards, including the Nectar airdrop, based on real participation.

By completing these tasks, you‚Äôre not just supporting the community.
You‚Äôre positioning yourself early, making sure your activity is visible before the next phase begins.

It only takes a minute.
Your support now will matter later.

name: Thank You Galxe Community!
description:
# Doma Loves You!

*Note: this is a repeat of the previous task due to an issue with verification.*

This quest is an additional thank you to all our Galxe community!

Thank you for brute testing our testnet, pushing so hard we had to upgrade our servers, finding bugs at incredible speed, all the likes, shares and content. We love you!

## This quest is simple:
1. Make a Doma mainnet account (https://app.doma.xyz)
2. Follow our X account
3. Follow Big Mike for being so nice as to run this campaign


## Winners
10,000 people get 25 points on the Season 0 leaderboard. Raffle.

Quest ends on Sunday, February 8th 2026 at 2PM UTC.


### Please Note
Updating is manual and will be updated every Monday/Wednesday/Friday whenever Big Mike gets to it! If it hasn't updated, come bug us in the Discord.

LAST SNAPSHOT: February 1st 2PM UTC!

name: Landshare $LAND Lottery 2.0
description:
## LAND Lottery:  Early Belief, Better Odds

LAND Lottery 2.0 is live. This round is designed to reward longer-term holders and early participants, not quick entries. The campaign runs for 30 days, and anyone can join as long as they meet the holding requirement.

### üß† Core Rules (Read This First)
**To be eligible for the lottery:**
- You must buy at least 50 LAND
- You must hold those tokens for 15 consecutive days
- Your LAND must be purchased directly on PancakeSwap
- Wallet-to-wallet transfers do not qualify

If you sell, transfer, or move the LAND during the **15-day holding period**, your entry is disqualified.

**üéüÔ∏è Tickets & Entry Timing:** 
- 50 LAND = 1 base ticket
- No maximum cap: more LAND = more tickets
- The campaign lasts 30 days, so you can join early or later (e.g. Day 1 or Day 15)

**However, when you enter matters üëá**

### ‚ö° Early Entry Multipliers
To incentivize early participation, ticket multipliers apply based on when you buy your LAND:

- Days 1‚Äì3: üî• **x3 tickets**
- Days 4‚Äì10: ‚ö° **x2 tickets**
- Days 11‚Äì15: x1 ticket

üö® **After Day 15, new entries are no longer accepted**, as the 15-day holding requirement must still be met before the campaign ends.

### üõí How to Participate
- Buy 50+ LAND directly on [PancakeSwap](https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?chain=bsc&outputCurrency=0xA73164DB271931CF952cBaEfF9E8F5817b42fA5C)
- Connect your wallet & verify your purchase 
- Complete other Galxe tasks
- Hold your LAND for 15 days in a row

That‚Äôs it - once the holding period is complete, you‚Äôre eligible.

#### üí∞ Rewards
- 1,000 LAND total prize pool
- 10 winners selected at random
- Odds are weighted by the number of valid tickets you hold

More tickets = better chances.

#### ‚è≥ Final Notes
This lottery rewards commitment, not speed.
Enter early, hold longer, and maximize your odds.

**LAND Lottery 2.0 is live, plan your entry wisely.**

name: Markets fall, but rewards rise
description:

Can be freely bought and sold

Owning the Olympex Pass is essential to participate in Olympex and access upcoming rewards.

name: CHECKPOINT BLITZ
description:
## QUICK QUESTS. FAST REWARDS. FASTER WINS.


#### gotta' go fast, gotta' BLITZ   ‚îÄ=‚â°Œ£((( „Å§ÔºûÔºú)„Å§

BLITZ is built for speed. Jump into quick quests, earn rewards fast, and keep moving faster. No long grinds, just focused action and fast payoffs.

‚Ä¶but wait, what is Checkpoint? Checkpoint is your home for points. We are building the architecture that makes points usable, ONCHAIN. Today, people use it to check and track their points, projects use it to display points or build apps and soon you will be able to do much more with it.

Learn more about Checkpoint with our  [docs](https://docs.checkpoint.exchange) OR check our [web app](https://checkpoint.exchange/?ref=galxe).

#### About CHECKPOINT BLITZ

BLITZ is an ongoing campaign, with quests regularly opening and closing within 6-48 hour windows. New opportunities appear often, so check back frequently to catch the latest quests and an opportunity to earn sweet rewards.

Rewards match the speed of the campaign and are typically smaller than those in our mainline campaigns. Each quest stands on its own and may have different entry requirements.

name: CHECKPOINT SPRINT
description:
## 100K G$ total reward. Ends in 2 weeks.

Welcome, welcome, (*¬¥‚àáÔΩÄ)„Éé

name: 2026 Launch Season: Early Community Gets Rewarded
description:
This year will mark a new phase for Olympex, with major launches, platform updates, and long-awaited features finally coming live.

Before everything goes public, before the noise, and before everyone arrives late, we want to recognize the people who have been here from the beginning.

This Social Task is about showing real support.
Not hype.
Not speculation.
Just being present, engaging, and helping grow the community where everything starts.

By completing this task and supporting us on X and Telegram, you‚Äôre making your activity visible as an early supporter.
That activity will be taken into account as we roll out future rewards, access, and benefits throughout 2026.

We believe long-term value is built with the people who show up early, not those who arrive once everything has already taken off.

It only takes a minute.
And it puts you in the right place for what‚Äôs coming next.

name: Mahjong Stars: A Quest for $TILE
description:
**Mahjong Stars is launching soon.**

Complete the quest to get early access and earn $TILE before the public release.
Connect your wallet, follow the steps, and be ready for launch. Early players get the best rewards.

**$TILE** is our onchain token - it gives discounts on Star Points, unlocks premium matches and events, lets you buy NFTs, and earns staking rewards.
Star Points are the in-game (off chain) currency you use to play matches, place bets, earn rewards, and cash out through NFTs.

At the end, top players secure IRL Gold Tile collectibles - real physical Mahjong tiles made with real gold accents from our limited 144-piece set.
